name: George D. LENTZ and Correctional Instructional Vocational Education Association, PSEA/NEA, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, State Civil Service Commission

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: George D. LENTZ and Correctional Instructional Vocational Education Association, PSEA/NEA, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, State Civil Service Commission.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas W. Scott, Kimber L. Latsha, Harrisburg, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
526 A.2d 359
George D. LENTZ and Correctional Instructional Vocational Education Association, PSEA/NEA, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, State Civil Service Commission.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 14, 1987.
Decided June 8, 1987.
Thomas W. Scott, Kimber L. Latsha, Harrisburg, for appellants.
John Alzamora, Harrisburg, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
